html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-04002025-03-12FIN
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Northern Residents Deductions)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (NORTHERN RESIDENTS DEDUCTIONS) in order to (1) to provide that Haida Gwaii is included in the definition of the Northern Zone for the purposes of the Northern Residents Deductions; and (2) to remove Haida Gwaii from the definition of the Intermediate Zone for the purposes of the Northern Residents Deductions in the regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0097 Publication Date: 2025-03-26
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (NORTHERN RESIDENTS DEDUCTIONS) in order to (1) to provide that Haida Gwaii is included in the definition of the Northern Zone for the purposes of the Northern Residents Deductions; and (2) to remove Haida Gwaii from the definition of the Intermediate Zone for the purposes of the Northern Residents Deductions in the regulations.
